page.title: 09Recreation _ Play areas
page.content: One of the areas we play on is called the rec.It has a full size football pitch,some baby swings,adult swings,a banana slide,climbing frame and a small sand pit.Another place to play is the woods where you can play hounds and hares and hide and seek.We have a playing field which has a rugby club and a full size rugby pitch and it has a BMX track.We have another playing area on the club green we play football,tennis,cricket,tigy,rounders and sometimes we play on the co op wall to play squash and tennis and sometimes we play walley.This is played with a few people and a football and the one who misses the wall is out and the one left in is the winner.
